workout_groups.name: Beginner Level Dynamic Stretching
workout_groups.description: Improve mobility, flexibility, and movement range with beginner-friendly dynamic stretches.

workouts.name: Arm Circles
workouts.description: Rotate your arms in small, controlled circles, gradually increasing the size.

workouts.name: Leg Swings (Front to Back)
workouts.description: Swing one leg forward and backward in a controlled motion to loosen the hips.

workouts.name: Torso Twists
workouts.description: Stand with feet shoulder-width apart and rotate your torso side to side gently.

workouts.name: Knee Raises
workouts.description: March in place while bringing your knees up to waist level.

workouts.name: Shoulder Rolls
workouts.description: Roll your shoulders forward and backward in smooth, controlled motions.

workouts.name: Side Lunges
workouts.description: Step to the side and shift your weight, stretching the inner thigh dynamically.

workouts.name: Ankle Circles
workouts.description: Rotate your ankle in circles, first clockwise, then counterclockwise.

workouts.name: Hip Circles
workouts.description: Stand with feet apart and rotate your hips in large circles.

workouts.name: Heel-to-Toe Walk
workouts.description: Walk forward in a straight line, placing each foot heel-to-toe to improve balance and flexibility.

workouts.name: Standing Side Bends
workouts.description: Lean side to side, stretching your obliques while keeping movement fluid.

workouts.name: Toe Touch Walks
workouts.description: Walk forward while reaching to touch your toes with each step.

workouts.name: Wrist Circles
workouts.description: Gently rotate your wrists in circular motions to improve mobility.

workouts.name: Quadriceps Pull
workouts.description: While walking, pull your ankle toward your glutes, stretching the quadriceps dynamically.

workouts.name: Neck Rolls
workouts.description: Slowly roll your head in a circular motion to release neck tension.

workout_groups.name: Mid-Level Dynamic Stretching
workout_groups.description: More complex mobility drills to enhance flexibility, stability, and coordination.

workouts.name: High-Knee Pulls
workouts.description: Pull your knee to your chest while balancing on the opposite leg.

workouts.name: Lateral Leg Swings
workouts.description: Swing your leg side-to-side to open up hip mobility.

workouts.name: Dynamic Lunge Twists
workouts.description: Perform forward lunges while twisting your torso over the front leg.

workouts.name: Scorpion Kicks
workouts.description: Lay on your stomach and reach one foot over your body toward the opposite hand.

workouts.name: Worldâ€™s Greatest Stretch
workouts.description: A deep lunge stretch with one arm reaching to the sky, opening up hips and thoracic spine.

workouts.name: Spinal Wave Rolls
workouts.description: Roll your spine from head to tailbone in a fluid motion.

workouts.name: Pigeon Walks
workouts.description: Move forward in a pigeon pose stretch, alternating legs to mobilize hips.

workout_groups.name: Advanced Dynamic Stretching
workout_groups.description: High-level dynamic stretching movements for increased mobility and flexibility.

workouts.name: Explosive Cossack Squats
workouts.description: Perform deep side squats with explosive transitions between legs.

workouts.name: Jumping Lunge Twists
workouts.description: Perform lunges with a jump transition while twisting the torso dynamically.

workouts.name: Frog Squat to Stand
workouts.description: Squat deep into a frog stance, then push into a full standing stretch.

workouts.name: Dynamic Bridge Kickovers
workouts.description: Push into a bridge and kick one leg over to land into a lunge position.

workouts.name: Rolling Shoulder Stretch
workouts.description: Roll forward into a shoulder stretch and smoothly transition between positions.

workouts.name: Split Walks
workouts.description: Walk forward in a split position, alternating legs to increase hamstring flexibility.

workout_groups.name: Super Dynamic Stretching
workout_groups.description: Extreme flexibility, agility, and power movements for elite mobility training.

workouts.name: Aerial Pike Kicks
workouts.description: Explosively kick your legs into a pike stretch mid-air before landing.

workouts.name: Planche Walks
workouts.description: Hold a planche position while stepping forward with your hands.

workouts.name: Dragon Pistol Squats
workouts.description: Perform a pistol squat with the opposite leg wrapping behind the standing leg.

workouts.name: Reverse Bridge Rollouts
workouts.description: Roll from a full bridge position into a standing stretch seamlessly.

workouts.name: Explosive Handstand Push-off
workouts.description: Push off the floor dynamically from a handstand and transition smoothly into another movement.

workouts.name: Dynamic Van Damme Splits
workouts.description: Perform split jumps, landing with feet further apart each time to increase range.
